game.description: Pink Sox 6 is a collection of adult-themed mini-games in various genres. It includes the conclusion of the sci-fi adventure Who Is There from the previous games, as well as a new chapter in the Balancing Beam of Love, introducing a new heroine in a superhero comic book-like setting. There are two new mini-games: the first, entitled PC City, consists of a floating island and a few scenes (mostly involving young women) that occur when the player accesses various locations on it (such as a ship, an observatory, a medieval castle, etc.). The second mini-game is sub-titled Let's Zazen and depicts a comical Zen lesson as the player switches between pupils trying to avoid the master's blows.
game.name: Pink Sox 6
